name: Demetrius LLOYD, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of September, 2011, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
